name: SI14
author: Does it really matter at this point?
summary: The Aliens are attacking! The Laser Cannon must quickly shoot down all invaders before the Bunkers are destroyed otherwise it loses. Watch out for Baneful Bunker who destroys anyone!

sides.winmsg: The Space Invaders (~Players~) destroyed all the human's forces and now they control the Earth!
The Defenders (~Players~) won and now the Earth is a safe place!

roles.help: You're the Laser Cannon! Destroy your enemies with your laser typing /kill during the standby! However, you should be protected by a Bunker, because if you die, the Space Invaders win!
roles.info: Can kill one player during the standby. Sided with the Defenders.

kill.killmsg: ~Self~ aimed at ~Target~ and destroyed him with a laser shot!! IMMA FIRIN MAH LAZER!!!

onDeath.killmsg: ±Space Invaders:  When ~Self~ died, all the Bunkers were defenseless and they surrendered!

roles.help: You're Bunker! Sturdy and resistant, you can block the Alien's attack! But you'll have to choose, because you can protect the Laser Cannon or yourself up to 3 times in the game! Make wise decisions, because if all the Bunkers or the Laser Cannon die, the Space Invaders win!
roles.info: Can protect or selfprotect one player during the night up to 3 times. Sided with the Defenders

protect.chargesmsg: You can only protect ~Charges~ more times!

kill.msg: You hit the Baneful Bunker. It destroyed you!

actions.daykillrevengemsg: ~Target~ aimed at ~Self~ and destroyed him with a laser shot!! IMMA FIRIN MAH LAZER!!! But then ~Self~ (the Baneful Bunker) exploded and took down ~Target~ with them and now the aliens are win!!!!!!11!!1!

roles.help: You're an alien! Time to kill all that stupid humans and control the Earth! Type /kill during the night! Also, each 2 nights you have an extra nightkill with /kill2, and that's not shared with your team!! You can use /tt [message] to talk to your teammates.
roles.info: Can kill one player during the night (Shared). Can kill one player each 2 nights (Not-Shared). Sided with the Space Invaders.
